definition: a lock of hair that has been artificially waved or curled, to curl tightly
details:
noun
- a lock of hair that has been artificially waved or curled
- someone who tricks or coerces men into service as sailors or soldiers
= synonyms: crimper
- an angular or rounded shape made by folding
= synonyms: flexure
verb
- to curl tightly
= example: to curl tightly
= synonyms: crape
- to make ridges into by pinching together
= synonyms: pinch
